import React,{useEffect}from"react";import PanelTemplate from"./PanelTemplate";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Account(){const navigate=useNavigate();const git=page=>{navigate("".concat(page));};const[info,setInfo]=React.useState({});// Bilgilerin çekildiği sayfadaki useEffect (Örnek)
